kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '47', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"username": "admin", "password": "masterPass"}'
